function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Gathering data from 30 participants may not be representative of the entire construction industry in the UK.","Impact":"Limited generalizability of findings and potential for biased results.","Mitigation":"Conducting a larger and more diverse survey to ensure a broader representation of the industry.","Technologies":"Data analysis and visualization tools for larger datasets.","People":"Research participants and stakeholders in the construction industry.","Owner":"Research team and industry stakeholders."},{"Description":"Using closed-ended questions and predetermined interview questions may limit the depth of data collected.","Impact":"Limited insight into complex and nuanced effects of pandemics on the construction industry.","Mitigation":"Incorporating open-ended questions and qualitative interviews for in-depth understanding.","Technologies":"Qualitative data analysis software for thematic analysis.","People":"Researchers, industry experts, and practitioners.","Owner":"Research team and industry stakeholders."},{"Description":"Reliance on Likert scale responses may oversimplify participants' views and experiences.","Impact":"Risk of oversimplification and lack of nuanced understanding of participants' perspectives.","Mitigation":"Supplementing Likert scale with qualitative data analysis to capture diverse experiences.","Technologies":"Qualitative data analysis software for thematic analysis.","People":"Research participants and stakeholders in the construction industry.","Owner":"Research team and industry stakeholders."}]}
